title: Science for life
creator_contributor_role: Peace Committee of the Society of Friends (Quakers), production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Forums (Discussion and debate)
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Science - Study and teaching
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Knowledge, Theory of
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Forums (Discussion and debate)
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Science - Study and teaching
description: A teenage schoolboy is engaged in the quest for scientific knowledge. Two senior scientists bring the boy face to face with the challeng of - science to what end - life or death? A straightforward dramatisation of a debate intended to arouse lively and useful discussion for teenage audiences.
